top_stories.title: [Archive] Perplexity accused of scraping websites that explicitly blocked AI scraping

top_stories.title: [Archive] UniRG: Scaling medical imaging report generation with multimodal reinforcement learning
top_stories.summary: AI can help generate medical image reports, but today’s models struggle with varying reporting schemes. Learn how UniRG uses reinforcement learning to boost performance of medical vision-language models.
